** 2.2**
```{r}

  group_by(Second) %>%
  tally() %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  filter(Second != "undervote") %>%
  head(5)

```
**2.3**
```{r}

  filter(First == "undervote") %>%
  group_by(First) %>%
  tally()

```

```{r}

  group_by(Second) %>%
  tally()

```

